settings.person_description: This mattress exceeded my expectations! Incredibly comfortable and supports my back perfectly. The quality is outstanding, and the price is reasonable.
Ordered the king size at the recommendation of a colleague. It has really improved my sleep. Would definitely recommend. 10/10.
I kept bugging them to bring this to India for the last 4 months. Bought 3 of them as soon as it was available. Good price, good sleep!
Was gifted this by a friend on my birthday. Quite comfortable and good back support since I sleep on my back. Will buy again for my parents.
I was surprised to learn that Emma came to India. Bought the Emma Black for my family and it has been really good so far! Can sleep very well.
So much better than any other mattress available in the market at this price!! The mattress is just the right firmness and I love it.

settings.for_matress_image_text_for_textes_1: Our award winning and proprietary Airgocell® foam helps millions of sleepers worldwide in sleeping cool and sweat-free. Its unique curing process ensures unmatched porosity resulting in a breezy sleep experience in all climates.
settings.for_matress_image_text_for_textes_2: Whether you're lying down or sitting up, HyperAdapt® adjusts to your every move, ensuring maximum comfort, regardless of your body type. Straight from our Research Lab in Frankfurt, this technology is engineered for versatility, intelligently responding to different point loads seamlessly.
settings.for_matress_image_text_for_textes_3: Reinforced edge support ensures better stability. Multi-layer spindle stitch to prevent wear and tear.
